title: The Challenges of Indonesian students to study at Inholland University Research : How to address the unexpected decline of Indonesian students studying at Inholland University Amsterdam/Diemen?
abstract: INHolland University of applied sciences is a polytechnic college located in the Netherlands. One of the countries INHolland has been successful collaborating with is Indonesia. However starting from 8 years ago, the Indonesian market showed an unexpected decline in numbers of Indonesian students coming to study at INHolland Amsterdam/Diemen. These reports conducted similar researches, having in mind a research objective of gaining more information about Indonesian students and their opinion in regards of which countries to choose when it comes to studying abroad. The primary research was conducted through interviews and questionnaires with Indonesian students studying at INHolland and ones living in Indonesia. Having this step done, a recommendation plan should be provided to help overcome such dilemma. In other words, it?s more of a different payment method used especially for the Indonesian students. . ?, * 4, Both parties are winner in such plan, and moreover, INHolland is building higher brand awareness with this plan being a unique university with a university tuition fee payment method. This plan is not only for Indonesians, once this plan is proven to be a success, IBMS and other English-taught programs can expand to other countries such as Russia, China, and India.
